Text: What the...
Is that the best you can do?
Grr...!ã€€This is only the beginning!
Lutheran's attacks pick up speed.

They leave beautiful, white afterimages along the
arcs they trace through the air.

However, each of these silvery strikes, accompanied
with a roar, are turned aside by Shadow's ebony blade.

I never suspected you were so skilled... Heh...heheh. 
But no matter how powerful you are, this is the end
for you.

I have orchestrated this entire attack so that it
will appear to be your doing. The evidence, the
testimony, all of it.

All the world will hunt you and your followers as
outlaws... No amount of might can withstand that.
...How amusing.
What?!

It's amusing of you to think that such a pathetic
ploy could stop us.

We have never walked the path of justice nor have we
walked the path of evil.
The only path we walk...is our own...

Heap the sins of the world upon us, if you think you
can. We will gladly accept them...
But know that it will change nothing. For Iâ€•
We...will accomplish what we set out to do.

Mighty arrogant of you to not fear opposing the
world, Shadow!
Then crush it out of me.
Yaaaaaahhh!!!
Lutheran lets loose a roar and charges.
Urgh...
Shadowâ€™s ebony blade skewers Lutheran's right hand.
The blade next pierces his left knee.
Gragh!

Shadow's thrusts pursue Lutheran as he staggers
back.
Urgh...agh...!

Unable to mount any attack of his own, Lutheran
becomes drenched in more of his own blood.

From his knees to his thighs to his shoulders, the
unending stabs poke more holes in Lutheran.

The attacks gradually focus toward the center of
his body.
Pierce the extremities and work my way inward...
And a twist in the heart, was it?
Wha?!
The ebony blade plunges into Lutheranâ€™s chest.
Gurgh... *cough*
Grgh...agah...aaaah...!

Shadow doesn't wait for him to speak, instead
twisting his sword.
Aaaaaaah...!!!
You...!
Ha...haha...!

Shadow withdraws his blade, unleashing a huge gush of
blood. The light fades from Lutheran's eyes and
the ancient text. All that remains is the thin
corpse of a middle-aged man.
Suddenly, there is the sound of small footsteps.
Foster Father...?
Ah... Aaaah!
Foster Fatherrrrrrr!!!
Nooo... Foster Father, why... Why?!
Foster Father! Foster Fatherrrrrrr!!!

Despite clinging to his corpse and spilling tears
over it, Lutheran will never stir again.
...You don't need to know any of this.

With a last glance down at the trickle of Sherry's
tears, Shadow turns away.
AAAaaaaaaa...

He vanishes into the dark of the night, the girl's
wailing at his back.
